title: Practical Application of Internet-Based Programs for Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary internet utilization skills and knowledge of science curriculum content
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented graduate course for advanced science professionals, delivered asynchronously via LMS. Learners receive digital devices to focus on utilizing internet-based science education materials and instructional design.

learning_goals: Learners can search educational resources using scientific databases such as CIESIN.
Learners can complete the science curriculum design process by integrating internet-based tools.
Learners can evaluate educational suitability by applying digital resource assessment criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
